page.title: 08THE GAMEKEEPER
page.content: 12th of August-Start of the Grouse Season. 18th of September-Start of the Deer Stalking Season. November 1st to Mid-January-Stalking of the hinds. November to March-Hare hunts. November 1st to the end of April-Feeding of the Deer with turnips and hay. April-Fox hunts,and hunts of other vermin. May to August the 12th-General repair work of vehicles,butts and roads.Holidays are generally taken at this time. Equipment for Grouse Beating-Radio,whistle,stick,flag and dogs.(Labradors,spaniels.) Equipment for Deer Stalking-Stick,telescope,binoculars,ri fle,bullets.(No dogs)
